Name: Candy Arkanoid
About the game: Candy Arkanoid is more than just a simple arcade game - it includes role-playing elements, allowing players to level up their Candy Arkanoid and customize its abilities. Hours of addictive gameplay and an invigorating soundtrack are waiting for you. Game features: You can upgrade in four ways: Damage Boost Critical Damage Splash Damage Ball Split level Overall, Candy Arkanoid is a fast-paced and addictive game that offers endless replay value for players of all skill levels. So why wait? Satisfy your sweet tooth and soon blast your way through the candy cosmos! /
